posts.post_content:
NOT looking to sell, only offering this card for trade. looking for major/drastic T206 printing error card(s). 

Feel free to contact me via PM. Only major T206 printing errors please (drastic miscuts, missing ink, overprints, etc).

Not sure a deal will be easily struck, but figured i'd give it a shot.

Thanks!
Michael

looking for psa 6 cards john butler  doc adkins   al bridwell no cap   lou ciger   jim delanhanty  wash   rube Dessau   art devlin   mike dolin fielding   jigs Donahue   bob ganley   buck Herzog ny   ed konetchy  glove high   arlie latham   lefty leifield batting   hans lobert   fred merkle portrait   fred merkle throwing   George moriarty   George mullin with bat    fred parent    harry pattee    phil Poland   jack powell   ambrose puttman   bob rhoades right arm out    Germany Schafer Detroit   George schirm    admiral schlei portrait   spike Shannon   jimmy slagle if anyone is interested in selling please call me 5613508009 my email is [url]mollysenior2003@yahoo.com[/url]

ok. you said you wanted your missing red ink card back right? here is your shot.

kevin
Sorry Kevin, values are way off. but thanks.

well aware there is a mismatch. but maybe we can work out a deal to include it.

Kevin- let's keep potential negotiations private in PM's.
Nice card Michael...someone snag this up!
